description: Automatically run relevant tests after code changes. Detects test files and runs appropriate test commands based on file extensions and project structure.

hooks.command: if [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.js || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.ts ]] && [[ -f package.json ]]; then npm test 2>/dev/null || yarn test 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]] && [[ -f pytest.ini || -f setup.cfg || -f pyproject.toml ]]; then pytest "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || python -m pytest "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.rb ]] && [[ -f Gemfile ]]; then bundle exec rspec "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
